mapper.select: SELECT d.*, c1.codeName organizationName, c2.name corporateName FROM DonationPurpose d left JOIN Code c1 ON d.organizationId = c1.id left JOIN Corporate c2 ON d.corporateId = c2.id ORDER BY c2.id, c1.id, d.id
mapper.insert: INSERT DonationPurpose (corporateId, organizationId, name, gubun) VALUES (#{corporateId}, #{organizationId}, #{name}, #{gubun})
